the included ipw2200 drivers don't work?
why don't you just ``sudo apt-get --reinstall install linux-image-$(uname -r)''?
no, don't try to recompile the ipw2200 driver.
--reinstall install  reinstalls the entire kernel image + modules, so you should be able to just ``sudo depmod -e && sudo modprobe ipw2200''
